metadata.name: Cat and Aeroplane
metadata.description: The minimalist artwork features a black cat sitting on a plain white windowsill, with a modern building in the distance. A small airplane flies above the building. The simple lines and shapes of the artwork create a clean and minimalistic aesthetic, emphasizing the beauty of simplicity. The clean background further enhances the minimalistic feel of the artwork. The cat and the building both serve as symbols of the calm and understated elegance of minimalism, while the airplane adds a touch of movement and dynamism to the overall composition.
